message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. It's a great deal, considering the value it brings to you.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $12000?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I can meet you halfway, though. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14000. It's a fair price, considering the value it brings to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?
